command_description.fillhex: Fill one coordinate with the desired color.
command_description.canvas: Check out the canvases that have been made so far.

color_hex.name: color
color_hex.description: Please input a hexadecimal color. It must be of the same format as #000000

fill.timelimit: Please try again After **{{ .seconds }}second(s)** to fill in another color.
fill.unknown_color: Please check again if the color is entered in the same format as `#000000`.

canvas.title: CANVAS ({{ .year }}. {{ .month }}.)
canvas.footer: If the canvas hasn't been updated, you can check it out directly through the button below.
